TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAssertion extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents a Security Assertion Markup Language 1.1 (SAML 1.1) assertion.

span.span: Represents a Security Assertion Markup Language 1.1 (SAML 1.1) assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會對應到已在 OASIS SAML 1.1 規格中定義之 `` XML 項目。The class corresponds to the `` XML element that is defined in the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification. 安全性權杖的宣告會包含在 中。The claims for security tokens are contained within a . 包含可擴充的宣告集合，即以 屬性表示的 SAML 陳述式。A has an extensible set of claims known as SAML statements that are represented by the property. 核發此 SAML 判斷提示的 SAML 授權單位會指定於 屬性中。The SAML authority that issued the SAML assertion is specified in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會保留在讀取時使用的來源資料方法，可以重新發出原始資料，只要屬性未變更的判斷提示已讀取的時間。The default implementation preserves the source data when read using the method and can re-emit the original data as long as the property has not changed from the time that assertion was read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 它是非常重要的 SAML 判斷提示，使用不同的資料有不同的識別碼。It is very important that SAML assertions with different data have different IDs. 如果實作的配置，藉此判斷提示 「 範本 」 載入並特定位元的資料會填入，則必須變更 Id。If implementing a scheme whereby an assertion "template" is loaded and certain bits of data are filled in, the Id must be changed.

summary.span: Gets or sets the security credentials that are used to digitally sign the SAML assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性，表示在 SAML 判斷提示序列化為 XML 時用來數位簽署 SAML 判斷提示的認證。The property represents the credentials that are used to sign a SAML assertion when it is serialized into XML. 同樣地， 屬性表示在傳入 SOAP 訊息中簽署 SAML 權杖的安全性權杖。Similarly, the property represents the security token that signed a SAML token in an incoming SOAP message.

span.span: Gets the security token contained in or referenced by a digitally signed SAML assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已呼叫 方法且 SAML 判斷提示也經過數位簽署，則數位簽章會設定為 屬性。When the method is called and a SAML assertion is digitally signed, the digital signature is set to the property. 如果 SAML 判斷提示未經過數位簽署，則 的屬性值為 `null`。When the SAML assertion is not digitally signed, the value of the property is `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 屬性為 時，即可使用 `false` 來設定與 SAML 關聯的 SAML 陳述式，或是將它直接新增至這個屬性傳回的集合。Use the to set the SAML statements associated with a SAML assertion or add it directly to the collection that is returned by this property when the property is `false`. 下表會將三種已定義於 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 規格之 SAML 陳述式型別分別對應至其個別型別。The following table maps the three types of SAML statements defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML specification to their respective types. |陳述式型別Statement Type|CLR 型別CLR Type| |--------------------|--------------| |驗證Authentication|| |屬性Attribute|| |授權決策Authorization decision|| |定義在擴充結構描述中的陳述式Statement defined in an extension schema|| |定義在擴充結構描述中的主體陳述式Subject statement defined in an extension schema||
